script.name: Sig.Anarkis.Pirate.Unified
script.description: Pirate Guild - Signal : Unified Target Signal

line.comment: * Unified Signal Handling for PG 1.53 and over
* - Handle mission, reward and standard target ships in the same signal
* - Will only display the message if the reward is high enough
* - Can be used as both Killed and Captured
* - Added (Nicoman35): Money transfer for pirates dependent on object class
* - Handle Kill From Player (or player owned)
* - Handle Kill From Pirate Guild Ships

sval.val: Pirate Guild - Signal : Unified Target Signal
Unified Signal Handling for PG 1.53 and over
- Handle mission, reward and standard target ships in the same signal
- Will only display the message if the reward is high enough
- Can be used as both Killed and Captured
- Added (Nicoman35): Money transfer for pirates dependent on object class
- Handle Kill From Player (or player owned)
- Handle Kill From Pirate Guild Ships
